content.title: Chaturanga
content.desc: A four-player variant of chess made for Android. I was introduced to the game by one of my high school wrestling teammates. This was my first Unity project, so while the game may be far from perfect, I'm generally pleased with the result.

content.title: Coin Flip Simulator
content.desc: A rudimentary, text-based application that can simulate coin flips and keep a tally of the total heads and tails flipped. It is a very small and simple application I just threw together for fun.

content.title: Press The Button
content.desc: A simple game that tasks the player to press the on-screen button 10 times as quickly as possible. After each press the button will be relocated to a random position. After 10 presses, the player's final time is displayed.

content.title: Intersection Finder
content.desc: A simple application to test if two lines intersect. The user gives 4 points, 2 for the first line and 2 for the second. Their line equations are calculated and compared to see where they intersect, if at all.

content.title: Point In Triangle
content.desc: A simple application to test if a point is inside, on an edge of, or outside a triangle. The user gives 4 points, the first 3 for the triangle, the last as the point to be analyzed. The point's position relative to the triangle is calculated and reported.
